title: It's Complicated! with James Kourtides on The Hierarchy of Heaven and Earth & Jordan B Peterson
description:
James joins Karen to discuss the intersections between the ideas of Douglas Harding and Jordan Peterson as we look at the last chapter (The Angels of Darkness) of Harding's book, The Hierarchy of Heaven and Earth.

We discuss knowledge, wisdom, information, the necessity of hierarchies.
The need for honest communication and self-sacrifice and the state of  today's world (including COVID and political polarization) that is going to require both of those from us who claim to have faith.

James Kourtides' YouTube channel: 
https://youtube.com/c/JAMESKOURTIDES

Chloe Valdary's conversation on The Meaning Code:
https://youtu.be/ph8fi1iytwQ

John Wood, Jr. 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy2NKTrKM_MY_WbY8ISSq2g
Braver Angels: 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtlZ4t6aS4rAJoPyYD9DGLA
Chloe Valdary: 
https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=chloe+valdary+theory+of+enchantment
